description: CHANGE OF USE OF BUILDING FROM EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES TO RESIDENTIAL USE COMPRISING TWO HOUSES.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The garage(s) and/or car parking space(s) shown on the approved drawing garages shall be provided before commencement of the use of the land or building(s) hereby permitted and thereafter shall be kept free from obstruction and shall not be used for purposes other than the parking of vehicles in conjunction with the development hereby permitted.
Condition : 3 - The houses shall not be occupied until such time as car parking has been provided for two cars at each of the two houes hereby permitted, and this shall be kept available thereafter.

Condition : 4 - A tree planting/landscaping scheme shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval and be implemented during the next planting season after the completion of building operations on the site, or within such longer period as may be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, and shall include the reinstatement of a 1.8 metre high holly hedge along the Kingston Road and Dorset Road frontages.  Reason for Condition: To enhance and maintain the visual amenities and character of this part of the Merton (Merton Park) Conservation Area.
